FieldDefDTO Data Type

Represents a field definition in the system.

Properties
name data type description
type_id number The internal ID of the type. This field is read-only.
tooltip string The tooltip to display next to the field (i.e. the popup text to display when the user hovers over the "i" icon).
placeholder string The placeholder to display in the edit field (not applicable for all input types).
input_type InputType The input type for this field (e.g. "select", "multiselect", "text", etc.). For a list of valid input types, see constDTO (input_types property).
required FieldRequired The required status of the field. Valid values:
  • "always" - a value is always required, even when initially creating the object.
  • "close" - a value is required before the object (incident) can be closed. The Co3 UI will prompt the user on close if a value is not available.
  • null - a value is optional
hide_notification boolean The field should be hidden from the list of fields allowed in notification trigger conditions. Generally this should be false for custom fields.
chosen boolean Is the field a "chosen" field? This appears in the Co3 UI as "Advanced UI". It is valid only for select and multiselect fields. It's best to enable this option when there will be several values to choose from. This option allows the user to search the list for a certain value, and is more visually appealing for longer lists and multiselects."}
blank_option boolean Should a blank option be selectable in the UI? Enable this option if you'd like users to have the option of leaving the field blank.
internal boolean Is this field an internal Co3 field? This value is read-only.
operations array of MethodName The set of valid condition operations for this field. These are the conditions that can appear in the notification or action triggers section. This value is read-only.
values array of FieldDefValueDTO The possible values for this field. This is only applicable for select and multiselect fields.
uuid string The UUID of this field. This value is read-only. The server sets this value when the field is initially created.
perms FieldDefPermsDTO The permissions the caller has on this field. This value is read-only. This value is set based on the permissions of the caller. See FieldDefPermsDTO.
read_only boolean True if this is a read-only field, false otherwise.
operation_perms object The "permissions" for the individual condition methods.
changeable boolean Can the field values ever change? For example, the incident create_date field cannot ever change so changeable will be false for that field.
label_false string The label for a boolean false value. Default is "No" and is currently read-only.
label_true string The label for a boolean true value. Default is "Yes" and is currently read-only.
label_null string The label for a boolean null value. Default is "Unknown" and is currently read-only.
rich_text boolean
export_key string This value is used for export/import to uniquely represent this field
order number The order of this column in the table (1 = leftmost)
width number The width of this column
Properties inherited from PartialFieldDefDTO
string The name of the field (e.g. 'name', 'incident_type_ids', etc.)
string The text displayed right next to the field (e.g. "Name", "Incident Type", etc.).
number The internal ID of this field. This value is read-only. The server sets this value when the field is initially created.
string The prefix to use when setting the field value in a DTO. For example, the prefix for the "data_source_ids" field is "pii". When setting the value in an incident, you must include "data_source_ids" in a sub-JSON object named "pii". For example: 
   {
     "id": 555,
     "name": "Test incident",
     ...
     "pii": {
       "data_source_ids": [1234, 1235],
       ...
     }
   }

Example

{
  "type_id" : 12345,
  "tooltip" : "...",
  "placeholder" : "...",
  "input_type" : "datetimepicker",
  "required" : "always",
  "hide_notification" : true,
  "chosen" : true,
  "blank_option" : true,
  "internal" : true,
  "operations" : [ "value_added", "not_in" ],
  "values" : [ {
    "default" : true,
    "enabled" : true,
    "hidden" : true,
    "properties" : {
      "property1" : "...",
      "property2" : "..."
    },
    "uuid" : "...",
    "value" : { },
    "label" : "..."
  }, {
    "default" : true,
    "enabled" : true,
    "hidden" : true,
    "properties" : {
      "property1" : "...",
      "property2" : "..."
    },
    "uuid" : "...",
    "value" : { },
    "label" : "..."
  } ],
  "uuid" : "...",
  "perms" : {
    "delete" : true,
    "modify_name" : true,
    "modify_values" : true,
    "modify_blank" : true,
    "modify_required" : true,
    "modify_operations" : true,
    "modify_chosen" : true,
    "modify_default" : true,
    "modify_type" : [ "datepicker", "none" ],
    "sort" : true,
    "show_in_manual_actions" : true,
    "show_in_auto_actions" : true,
    "show_in_notifications" : true
  },
  "read_only" : true,
  "operation_perms" : { },
  "changeable" : true,
  "label_false" : "...",
  "label_true" : "...",
  "label_null" : "...",
  "rich_text" : true,
  "export_key" : "...",
  "order" : 12345,
  "width" : 12345,
  "name" : "...",
  "text" : "...",
  "id" : 12345,
  "prefix" : "..."
}
